Html: I'm developing a game on xbox 360 using xna. I would like to use Irony but I'm running into problems because the .NET Compact Framework for Xbox 360 doesn't support the System.Numerics namespace. Is there anyway to work around this issue?
that shouldn't be that hard, Numerics are used only for BigIntegers, so just carefully remove all references to this class (in your custom build)

Another suggestion is to create a custom Compiler Directive. Then with this directive, if it's to be compiled for the Compact Framework, you could use the Mono implementation of the System.Numerics assembly or a custom built one, else use System.Numerics from the .NET Framework.

Just a thought - as I've seen this approach taken for other projects targeting things such as SilverLight.
